DOC.brief_summary: Background : - Marijuana widely use illicit drug world , yet relatively little known user try quit without formal treatment ( spontaneous quit ) . Studies suggest common strategy many individual use spontaneous quitting , change one lifestyle identity , remind oneself negative consequence , support family friend , religion . However , research need determine potential treatment strategy marijuana use . Objectives : - To identify strategy use help marijuana quit among non-treatment seek adult marijuana user . - To identify withdrawal symptom experience marijuana quit relationship quit strategy use outcome quit attempt . - To evaluate whether subgroup marijuana user differ experience marijuana quit . Eligibility : - Individuals least 18 year age make least one attempt quit marijuana use . Design : - The study consist one visit approximately 1 2 hour . - Participants fill three questionnaire . The questionnaire different type question , ask background lifestyle , marijuana use crave pattern behavior , difficulty previous attempt quit use marijuana .
DOC.brief_title: Quiting Marijuana Use : Self-report Study Quitting Straegies Withdrawal Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Marijuana widely use illicit drug world , yet relatively little known user try quit without formal treatment ( so-called spontaneous quit ) . This study use two self-report questionnaire collect information socio-demographic characteristic , marijuana use history , difficult marijuana quit experience , marijuana crave convenience sample 1230 adult , non-treatment-seeking marijuana user . The questionnaire take 45-60 minute administer . Data analyze pattern correlation among characteristic quit attempt , include withdrawal symptom , quit strategy use , success . The marijuana crave data analyze evaluate validity measure marijuana crave . There direct benefit subject study participation . The scientific benefit improve understanding spontaneous quit marijuana use , may lead improved intervention marijuana user future . There physical risk subject . There risk anxiety embarrassment take questionnaire loss confidentiality sensitive information collect subject .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1. age 18 old 2. make least one attempt quit marijuana use 3. able give valid inform consent 4. ability understand English
